page.title: 06GOVERNMENT
page.content: {COMMUNITY EDUCATION SERVICES {Local Authority }in the Carrick area provides Youth Clubs, a Youth Enquiry Service, specialist coaching, Activity Clubs, Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme, visits, exchanges and camps. Also lead ership, instruction, premises and equi pment for these. {Staff}- an area manager,5 professional workers, 20 administration staff, and about 60 volunteers recruited from the general public. {Voluntary Organisations}eg. Boy Scouts Girl Guides, and Wolf Cubs exist.There is a Youth Panel and places on the Ayr shire Youth Advisory Council. {Initiatives for the Unemployed }are workshops to provide retraining and ad vice on educational opportunities. Pro vision of premises for social and rec- reational activities outdoor education
